title: Tokyo stocks close higher on US rallies, cheap yen
text:
The benchmark Nikkei 225 index gained 0.55 per cent, or 125.22 points, to end at 22,750.60, while the broader Topix index was up 0.34 per cent, or 5.60 points, to 1,643.74.

[TOKYO] Tokyo stocks closed higher for a four-day winning streak on Thursday, helped by rallies on Wall Street and a cheaper yen against the dollar.

The benchmark Nikkei 225 index gained 0.55 per cent, or 125.22 points, to end at 22,750.60, while the broader Topix index was up 0.34 per cent, or 5.60 points, to 1,643.74.

AFP
description: : THE BUSINESS TIMES Stocks - [TOKYO] Tokyo stocks closed higher for a four-day winning streak on Thursday, helped by rallies on Wall Street and a cheaper yen against the dollar. . Read more at The Business Times.
